Preview.about: I'm a UX Designer and Web Developer (React.js & Node.js) with a focus on creating exceptional digital experiences that are user-centric, accessible, usable, visually appealing, and responsive. I have been  designing web and android applications for over a year and developing web applications for over a year now, I have a deep passion for designing and researching about user psychology.

About.heading: About me
About.title: Curious about me? Here you have it:
body: I'm a passionate, self-proclaimed designer who specializes in UX Designing and Web Development (React.js & Node.js). I am very enthusiastic about bringing the technical and visual aspects of digital products to life. User experience, pixel perfect design, and writing clear, readable, highly performant code matters to me.

I have started my journey over a year back as a designer and a web developer in 2023, and since then, I've continued to grow and evolve as a designer and a developer, taking on new challenges and learning the latest technologies along the way.

About.summary: Finally, some quick bits about me.
About.last-thing: One last thing, I'm available for freelance work, so feel free to reach out and say hello! I promise I don't bite 😉
